data.text: @MarlowNYC Charlize Theron is getting so many mentions for Mad Max. It’s probably the best action performance of the 21st century.

Runners-Up:
2017: Haley Lu Richardson, COLUMBUS
2016: Royalty Hightower, THE FITS
2015: Paul Dano, LOVE & MERCY
2014: Jack O'Connell, STARRED UP
2013: Joaquin Phoenix, HER
